content: **crocheted bottle bag in drops muskat the piece is worked in the round bottom up ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-821 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 8 cm in diameter **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 81 clay **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
